element.label: SocialContextR2
element.definition: Most systems allow various aspects of social history to be captured but the data is extremely variable, inconsistent, and almost universally an unstructured narrative. In Release 2 the Data Dictionary contains data elements that support a pragmatic start point for recording structured data that will support provision of clinical care, drive clinical decision support or identify risks related to social determinants of health.
element.comment:
PREFACE:
Most systems allow various aspects of social history to be captured but the data is extremely
variable, inconsistent, and almost universally an unstructured narrative. In Release 2 the Data Dictionary contains data elements that support a pragmatic start point for recording structured data that will support provision of clinical care, drive clinical decision support or identify risks related to social determinants of health.
Contains:
- Social summary item (R1)
- Housing summary item
--- Housing record item
- Occupation summary item
- Education summary item

element.label: HousingSummaryItem
element.definition: Summary or persistent information about an individual's housing situation.
element.comment:
PREFACE: This clinical model is the first iteration of a more detailed record about housing. The ‘Housing summary item’ will provide a overview of all housing related information, comprising a narrative description only in Release 2. 

In the future, this model can be extended with more detailed data elements, including ‘Residential setting’ (including public place/temporary shelter) and ‘Housing security’ to support clinical data collections related to SDOH.

element.label: OverallDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the overall housing situation.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this housing summary was last updated.

element.label: LivingArrangementSummaryItem
element.definition: Summary and persistent information about the circumstances about an individual living alone or with others.

element.label: OverallDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the living arrangement for the individual.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this living arrangement summary was last updated.

element.label: SupportNetworkSummaryItem
element.definition: Persistent or summary information about the support and social network for an individual.

element.label: OverallDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the support and social network for an individual.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this support network summary was last updated.

element.label: EducationSummaryItem
element.definition: Summary or persistent information about an individual's current and past education or training.

element.label: OverallDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the overall education or training history.

element.label: HighestLevelCompleted
element.definition: Description of highest category of education or training completed.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this education summary was last updated.

element.label: OccupationSummaryItem
element.definition: Summary or persistent information about an individual's current and past jobs and/or roles.

element.label: OverallDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the overall occupation situation for the individual.

element.label: EmploymentStatus
element.definition: Statement about the individual's current employment.

element.label: [OccupationEpisode]
element.definition: Specific structured details about one or more occupation episodes.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this occupation summary was last updated.

element.label: OccupationEpisodeItem
element.definition: Details about a single job or role carried out by an individual during a specified period of time.

element.label: Occupation
element.definition: The main role of the individual.

element.label: JobTitle
element.definition: Name of the main job title held by the individual.

element.label: Description
element.definition: Narrative description about the job or role carried out by the individual.

element.label: DateCommenced
element.definition: The date when an individual started the job or role.

element.label: DateCeased
element.definition: The date when an individual stopped the job or role.

element.label: TransportationAccessSummaryItem
element.definition: Summary or persistent information about an individual's access, including barriers or difficulties in access, to transportation.

element.label: OverallDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the overall transportation access and availability for the individual.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this transportation access summary was last updated.

element.label: PersonalSafetySummaryItem
element.definition: Summary or persistent information about an individual's perception about their personal safety.

element.label: OverallDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the personal safety situation for the individual.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this personal safety summary was last updated.
